tasks.task: Assembling a DIY garden tool storage palette project.
subtasks: Standing the palette up to find the most level position.
Cutting cross rails for tool placement.
Mounting long-handled tools using cross rails and guides.
Building a shelf for heavy tools using support rails.
Attaching a front shelf for tools using a nail gun.
Drilling and gluing dowels for tool-mounted supports.
Adding hanging holes for angled dowels and j-hooks.
Securing miscellaneous tools using screws and blocks.
Mounting knee pads on the inner structure.

tasks.task: Finishing touches for tool storage palette.
subtasks: Choosing a finish (unpainted in this case) or applying a rustic treatment.

tasks.task: MAINTASK: Assembling a DIY garden tool storage palette
